
# üåøCotton Plant Disease Prediction & Get Cure App Using Artificial Intelligence

This Project is about predicting which leaf or plant is Healthy Cotton Plant or Disease Cotton Plant and used to tell it's cure if its Disease Cotton Plant and which insecticides¬†to use.
Suppose we get a Diseased Cotton Leaf, it will describe that this plant or leaf is diseased and will also tell it which insecticides¬†to use.

Now a day‚Äôs financial impact of agriculture is increasing day by day with the economic growth of our country, still agriculture is one wide sector and that plays a very important role for our county. 

While keeping track of diseases in plants with the help of specialists can be very costly in agriculture regions. There is a need for a system which can automatically detect the diseases as it can bring revolution in monitoring large fields of crop and then plant leaves can be taken to be cured as soon as possible after detection of disease.


![App Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DARK-art108/Cotton-Leaf-Disease-Detection/main/Utils/DSC_1119.jpg)


## Project Overview
In the dataset there are three folders like train , test and validation folder . In this dataset there are 4 category like diseased cotton leaf , diseased cotton plant , fresh cotton leaf , fresh cotton plant .

For this project , I have create deep learning model convolutional neural network(CNN) using keras library for our project cotton disease prediction . First of all, why I am using CNN because CNNs are used for image classification and recognition because of its high accuracy. 

It gives me more than 98% accuracy on training and validation data set in just 500 epochs. I am trying to increase accuracy with more data and epochs.
## Model Accuracy
![App Screenshot](https://i0.wp.com/indianaiproduction.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/model-accuracy.png?w=386&ssl=1)

It gives me more than 98% accuracy in just 500 epochs.

The loss function used was ‚Äúsparse_categorical_crossentropy‚Äù and optimizer used was ‚ÄúAdam‚Äù . For training the model we used Keras API with tensorflow at backend . The model showed good performance achieving a decent

## How to use App?
Just run ‚Äòaap.py‚Äô file in spyder or you can run it using anaconda prompt. Then you will get localhost address like ‚Äòhttp://127.0.0.1:5000/‚Äò enter it in any browser in your system then enjoy it.
Later on have also deployed on AWS Cloud.

Cotton disease prediction using Deep Learning and Deploy it using a flask web server.
